BugInstance.message: Method org.apache.shardingsphere.proxy.backend.hbase.checker.CommonHeterogeneousSQLStatementChecker.checkIsSinglePointQuery(Optional) makes literal string comparisons passing the literal as an argument
Method org.apache.shardingsphere.proxy.backend.hbase.checker.HBaseCheckerFactory.newInstance(SQLStatement) uses instanceof on multiple types to arbitrate logic
Method org.apache.shardingsphere.proxy.backend.hbase.checker.HeterogeneousSelectStatementChecker.checkSupportedWhereSegment() uses instanceof on multiple types to arbitrate logic

Method org.apache.shardingsphere.proxy.backend.hbase.checker.HeterogeneousSelectStatementChecker.checkBetweenExpressionIsExpected(ExpressionSegment) defines parameters more abstractly than needed to function properly

Method org.apache.shardingsphere.proxy.backend.hbase.checker.HeterogeneousUpdateStatementChecker.lambda$checkAssignmentIsOk$0(AssignmentSegment, String) uses iterator().next() on a List to get the first item
Method org.apache.shardingsphere.proxy.backend.hbase.connector.HBaseConnectionFactory.createConfiguration(YamlHBaseParameter) excessively uses methods of another class
Unconstrained method org.apache.shardingsphere.proxy.backend.hbase.connector.HBaseConnectionFactory.createConnection(YamlHBaseParameter) converts checked exception to unchecked
Method org.apache.shardingsphere.proxy.backend.hbase.connector.HBaseConnectionFactory.createConnection(YamlHBaseParameter) throws alternative exception from catch block without history
Constrained method org.apache.shardingsphere.proxy.backend.hbase.context.HBaseContext.close() converts checked exception to unchecked instead of another allowable checked exception
Unconstrained method org.apache.shardingsphere.proxy.backend.hbase.context.HBaseRegionWarmUpContext.loadRegionInfo(String, Connection) converts checked exception to unchecked
Method org.apache.shardingsphere.proxy.backend.hbase.context.HBaseRegionWarmUpContext.loadRegionInfo(String, Connection) throws alternative exception from catch block without history
Method org.apache.shardingsphere.proxy.backend.hbase.context.HBaseRegionWarmUpContext.loadRegionInfo(String, HBaseCluster) passes a simple String.format result to an SLF4J's or Log4j2's format string
Method org.apache.shardingsphere.proxy.backend.hbase.context.HBaseRegionWarmUpContext.syncExecuteWarmUp(String) passes a simple String.format result to an SLF4J's or Log4j2's format string
Method org.apache.shardingsphere.proxy.backend.hbase.converter.HBaseOperationConverterFactory.newInstance(SQLStatementContext) uses instanceof on multiple types to arbitrate logic

org.apache.shardingsphere.proxy.backend.hbase.converter.type.HBaseSelectOperationConverter.appendColumns(Query, SelectStatementContext): 2nd parameter 'selectStatementContext' could be declared as org.apache.shardingsphere.infra.binder.type.WhereAvailable instead

org.apache.shardingsphere.proxy.backend.hbase.converter.type.HBaseSelectOperationConverter.appendLimit(Scan, SelectStatementContext): 2nd parameter 'selectStatementContext' could be declared as org.apache.shardingsphere.infra.binder.statement.SQLStatementContext instead

Method org.apache.shardingsphere.proxy.backend.hbase.converter.type.HBaseSelectOperationConverter.appendBetween(Scan, ExpressionSegment, boolean) defines parameters more abstractly than needed to function properly

org.apache.shardingsphere.proxy.backend.hbase.converter.type.HBaseUpdateOperationConverter.addPutColumn(UpdateStatementContext, Put): 1st parameter 'updateStatementContext' could be declared as org.apache.shardingsphere.infra.binder.statement.SQLStatementContext instead
Method org.apache.shardingsphere.proxy.backend.hbase.converter.type.HBaseUpdateOperationConverter.addPutColumn(UpdateStatementContext, Put) uses iterator().next() on a List to get the first item
Class org.apache.shardingsphere.proxy.backend.hbase.exception.HBaseOperationException defines a computed serialVersionUID that doesn't equate to the calculated value
Unconstrained method org.apache.shardingsphere.proxy.backend.hbase.executor.HBaseExecutor.executeAdmin(Connection, HBaseAdminCallback) converts checked exception to unchecked
Unconstrained method org.apache.shardingsphere.proxy.backend.hbase.executor.HBaseExecutor.executeAdmin(Connection, HBaseAdminCallback) converts checked exception to unchecked
Unconstrained method org.apache.shardingsphere.proxy.backend.hbase.executor.HBaseExecutor.executeQuery(String, HBaseQueryCallback) converts checked exception to unchecked
Unconstrained method org.apache.shardingsphere.proxy.backend.hbase.executor.HBaseExecutor.executeQuery(String, HBaseQueryCallback) converts checked exception to unchecked
Unconstrained method org.apache.shardingsphere.proxy.backend.hbase.executor.HBaseExecutor.executeUpdate(String, HBaseUpdateCallback) converts checked exception to unchecked
Unconstrained method org.apache.shardingsphere.proxy.backend.hbase.executor.HBaseExecutor.executeUpdate(String, HBaseUpdateCallback) converts checked exception to unchecked
Class org.apache.shardingsphere.proxy.backend.hbase.executor.HBaseExecutor has a circular dependency with other classes
Method org.apache.shardingsphere.proxy.backend.hbase.executor.HBaseExecutor.executeAdmin(Connection, HBaseAdminCallback) throws alternative exception from catch block without history
Method org.apache.shardingsphere.proxy.backend.hbase.executor.HBaseExecutor.executeAdmin(Connection, HBaseAdminCallback) throws alternative exception from catch block without history
Method org.apache.shardingsphere.proxy.backend.hbase.executor.HBaseExecutor.executeQuery(String, HBaseQueryCallback) throws alternative exception from catch block without history

Method org.apache.shardingsphere.proxy.backend.hbase.executor.HBaseExecutor.executeUpdate(String, HBaseUpdateCallback) passes a simple String.format result to an SLF4J's or Log4j2's format string
Method org.apache.shardingsphere.proxy.backend.hbase.executor.HBaseExecutor.executeUpdate(String, HBaseUpdateCallback) passes a simple String.format result to an SLF4J's or Log4j2's format string
Method org.apache.shardingsphere.proxy.backend.hbase.result.query.HBaseGetResultSet.printExecuteTime(long, long) uses instanceof on multiple types to arbitrate logic
Method org.apache.shardingsphere.proxy.backend.hbase.result.query.HBaseGetResultSet.printExecuteTime(long, long) passes a simple String.format result to an SLF4J's or Log4j2's format string
Method org.apache.shardingsphere.proxy.backend.hbase.result.query.HBaseGetResultSet.printExecuteTime(long, long) passes a simple String.format result to an SLF4J's or Log4j2's format string
Method org.apache.shardingsphere.proxy.backend.hbase.result.query.HBaseGetResultSet.executeScanRequest(HBaseOperation) creates Boxed primitive from primitive only to cast to another primitive type
Method org.apache.shardingsphere.proxy.backend.hbase.result.query.HBaseListResultSet.listTablesInHBase() uses suboptimal sizing to allocate a collection
